forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain this morning with thunderstorms by evening. High 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunderstorms. High 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
